alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern Lincoln County; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Quay County; Roosevelt County; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 20 at 4:46PM MST until February 23 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 7 PM MST TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, southwest winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Eastern Lincoln County, Curry County, De Baca County, Guadalupe County, Quay County, Roosevelt County, Eastern San Miguel County, Northeast Highlands, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 8 AM to 7 PM MST Tuesday. For the High Wind Watch, from Wednesday morning through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be dangerous, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust will be possible. This may locally reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.
